msg_add_server_start: Step 1/5: Enter a unique ID for the server (short name in Latin letters, no spaces, e.g., `my_vps_1`). To cancel, type /cancel.
msg_error_server_id_invalid: Error: The ID must not contain spaces or non-Latin characters. Please try again.
msg_error_server_id_exists: Error: A server with this ID already exists. Please enter a different one.
msg_add_server_name: Step 2/5: Now enter the full name of the server to be displayed in the menu (e.g., `My AWS Server`).
msg_add_server_key: Step 5/5: Enter the absolute path to the private SSH key (e.g., `/root/.ssh/my_key`). If this is a local server, just leave this field empty by pressing Enter or sending `-`.
